name: SpaceFrontier HUJAM22
description:
In this Arcade  game you traveling in Space! Launch your SpaceShip and  travel among other Planets , Portals and Astreoids.

Controls: Only mouse clicking necessary! Drag and Launch the SpaceShip .You can pause by ESC and restart level by  R.

Tips:

  • Avoid Planets, Astreoids and  satelites  you can collide with them.
  • You have limited fuel and collect fuel for extra launch.
  • Portals will teleport you.
  • You can play on MAINMENU.

Originally made for the Hujam22 in 72 hours.

Team:

Ata Ayyıldız - Programming , Onur Altunışık - Programming  

Tolga Varlık - 2D Art  , Ceren Yöndem - 2D Art

There is no external  

ProjectFile:

You can acces Unity project files from this link:  Github/satas20/HUJAM22
